ingredients: 1 (15-ounce) can cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Wash and core the Roma tomatoes. Dice them into roughly 1/2-inch pieces.
In a large bowl, combine the diced tomatoes, chopped chives, lemon juice, chopped celery, oil, shredded mozzarella, lemon zest, and rinsed and drained cannellini beans.
In a small separate bowl, whisk together the egg whites and Dijon mustard until slightly frothy.
Gently fold the egg white mixture into the tomato and bean mixture. Be careful not to overmix, you want to keep the egg whites light and airy.
Season the salad generously with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste.
Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. Add more lemon juice for tanginess or salt/pepper to your preference.
Cover the salad and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
response.name: Lemon-Herb Cannellini Bean Salad with Tomato & Mozzarella
